comments.value: Silicosis, chronic bronchitis, and other pnuemoconioses from sandblasting with silica sand or using silicon carbide abrasives;

diseases.value: Diseases associated with this job task: Pneumoconioses, other Pulmonary disease, chronic obstructive Silicosis, acute Silicosis, complicated Silicosis, simple
